markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supreme Psychic Center](/Feats.aspx?ID=3860) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 203

**Archetype** [Psychic Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=193)

**Prerequisites**
[Psychic Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3858)

**Trigger**
Your turn in a psychic duel begins.

</column>

---

With the merest thought, you realign your mental defenses to your duel's circumstances. You Recenter.
name: Supreme Psychic Center
